location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū] to Captain Charles Sealy, Commander of the HC Cruizer Ternateand Senior Naval Officer in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Captain that the HC Benareswill be free to proceed to Bombay, as per the Captain's instructions, once the Resident has completed his tour of the Arabian coast. It notes however that as the HC Cruizer Nautilushas been dispatched to Bushire, he may be able to dispense with the Benaressooner, if the Nautilusis placed at his disposal.
